newsitem.title: USA: Cemex to repurchase US$200 mln of stock.
newsitem.headline: Cemex to repurchase US$200 mln of stock.

text.p: Cemex S.A. de C.V. said Monday its board has authorized the repurchase worth up to 1.6 billion pesos, equivalent to US$200 million, of its shares, net of cash dividends paid during the buyback period.
Under the program, it would buy shares worth at least 920 million pesos or US$115 million, net of cash dividends, it said.
At current market prices, the shares to be purchased would represent 2.3 percent of the value of the company's shares outstanding, it said.
The company said it will fund the repurchase program with funds generated from existing operations.
Cemex is one of the world's top producers of cement, ready-mix concrete and aggregates, with operations in 22 countries.
